pkgmetadata.longdescription: Perform Common JavaScript Operations in Shiny Apps using Plain R Code // Perform common JavaScript operations in Shiny applications without having to know any JavaScript. Examples include: hiding an element, disabling an input, resetting an input back to its original value, delaying code execution by a few seconds, and many more useful functions. 'shinyjs' also includes a colour picker widget, a colour picker RStudio addin, and can also be used to easily run your own custom JavaScript functions from R.
